commitMessage:
@@@[FLINK-17150][json][canal] Introduce Canal format to support reading canal changelogs

This closes #12152

@@@[FLINK-18299][json] Fix the non SQL standard timestamp format in JSON format


The current timestamp format in JSON format is not SQL standard which uses RFC-3339. This commit changes the default behavior to parse/generate timestamp using SQL standard. Besides.  it introduces an option "json.timestamp-format.standard" to have the ability to fallback to ISO standard. 

This closes #12661

@@@[FLINK-19002][canal][json] Support to only read changelogs of specific database and table for canal-json format

This closes  (#13294)

@@@[FLINK-19912][json] Fix JSON format fails to serialize map value with null keys

This closes #13972

@@@[FLINK-20861][json] Introduce an option for serializing DECIMALs in JSON as plain number instead of scientific notation

This closes #14604
